resources.string: The application will help maintain normal battery temperature in the cold winter so that the phone does not turn off in the cold and does not catch condensation

You can choose 3 intensity modes.

First mode: Suitable for maintaining the temperature when outside is from -10 to -20.

Second mode: Suitable for maintaining temperature when outside is from -20 to -25.

Third mode: Suitable for maintaining temperature when the street is -25 or more and if you accidentally dropped your phone in a snowdrift for a long time
